text: Joaquín Salvador Lavado Tejón, better known by his pen name Quino (; 17 July 1932 – 30 September 2020), was an Argentine cartoonist. His comic strip Mafalda (which ran from 1964 to 1973) is popular in many parts of the Americas and Europe. He was born in Mendoza, Argentina. Quino died on 30 September 2020 from a stroke in Mendoza, at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Argentine cartoonists Category:People from Mendoza
title: Quino
